profileAlternative.headline: Legal Assistant at Nodell, Glass and Haskell

positions.title: Paralegal
positions.description:
*Worked directly for General Counsel at Plaza Associates, Inc
*Prepared bankruptcy claims and followed the bankruptcy claim until completion.
*Responsible for drafting leases and renewals for one regional mall consisting of 200+ tenants, nine shopping centers and three office buildings.
*Responsible for tracking the leasing process from the first draft going out to the tenant until the lease is fully-executed by both landlord and tenant.
*Responsible for constructing a weekly leasing report sent to the owner of the company, vice president of the company, controller and leasing director.
*Gathered due diligence for three commercial property refinances and corresponded with lenders on a regular basis until closing of each refinance.
*Responsible for drafting minutes, resolutions, and amendments for corporate documents.
*Conducted the initial draft of incorporation documents for new entities and filing appropriate paperwork to the North Carolina Department of the Secretary of State.
*Filed all annual reports for limited liability companies and corporations.
*Drafted and processed necessary paperwork to form multiple international companies owned and operated by the owner of Plaza Associates, Inc., Samuel M. Longiotti.
*Administrative duties which consisted of but not limited to managing General Counsel’s calendar on a daily basis, answering the phones, maintaining tenant files and database, maintaining entity files and database and routine correspondence.
…

positions.title: Administrative Assistant
positions.description:
*Managed five field photographers responsible for photos in the Triangle Multiple Listing Service.
*Trained real estate agents on the media segment of Tempo (Internet based system for members of Triangle MLS).
*Assisted IDX Coordinator with managing and enforcing all rules of IDX, a program designed to give real estate brokers permission to display their listing data on each other’s web sites.
*Responsible for updating the Triangle Multiple Listing website with current events and classes pertaining to Triangle Multiple Listing Service and Raleigh Regional Association of REALTORS®
*Performed general administrative duties such as answering department calls, filing/document processing, managing department calendar, email correspondence and scheduling meetings.
*Managed the online company store for RRAR.
*Managed accounts payable and receivables.
*Maintained all inventory for RRAR Company Store.
*Provided and assisted customers with real estate supplies to better their real estate business.
*Ordered and organized all merchandise for RRAR company store.
*Created yearly budget for the company store and submitted it to Board of Directors for review.
